document_data.name: ''Potion of Animal Friendship''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Potions of animal friendship''''' were magical [[potion]]s that temporarily granted the power to befriend [[beast|animal]]s.
document_data.Description: Upon inspection, the liquid that composed a ''potion of animal friendship'' looked muddy. Agitating the fluid brought small animal bits into view, such as scales, [[cat]] claws, squirrel hairs, or bird tongues.
document_data.Powers: Upon drinking a ''potion of animal friendship'', the user gained the power to cast the ''[[animal friendship]]'' spell, as many times as desired, for one hour.
document_data.History: In the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], ''potions of animal friendship'' were sold at [[Corellon's Crown]], an herbalism shop in [[Trollskull Alley]] in the [[North Ward of Waterdeep|North Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]], run by the [[wood elf]] [[Fala Lefaliir]].
